metadata.title: Nestlé Brands' Products, Recipes and News

text: Learn about our commitment to sustainable cocoa farming practices.
There’s a new kid in town!
Introducing BOOST® Kids – a line of nutritional supplements formulated for kids aged 4-12!
​​​​​​A Satisfying Bite-Sized Snack!Drumstick Bites are crispy, crunchy bite-sized mini cones filled with a chocolatey nugget – just like the end of a classic Drumstick ice cream cone!
In the spirit of celebrating diversity in Canada, we’re sharing some of our favourite recipes from around the globe. Because nothing connects us more than sharing food together.
